name: mapify
description: Using Spotify, Ticketmaster, and Google Maps's APIs, our team created a platform for users to more easily and intuitively visualize upcoming events hosted by or featuring their favorite musical artists. By logging into Spotify, we are provided with a list of the user's favorite artists, which is used to query Ticketmaster's Discovery API that returns a list of events, which is then displayed on a map through the Google Maps API. This project was developed as a part of Northwestern's IEEE IE3 program.
author: Tyler Rodgers
